thread.title: Tory MP calls for careful decision making over Manchester mayor
thread.title_full: Tory MP calls for careful decision making over Manchester mayor

author: Graham Brady
title: Tory MP calls for careful decision making over Manchester mayor
text: Tory MP calls for careful decision making over Manchester mayor Manchester residents to vote on devolving power Graham Brady, Conservative MP for Altrincham and Sale West and Chairman of the 1922 Committee, would like to see a referendum on a Greater Manchester mayor Photo: PA By Graham Brady , Conservative Party MP for Altrincham and Sale West 9:34PM BST 13 Oct 2015
